sentence.Network_en: Lichen is a form in which green or bluegreen algae and a fungus live together symbiotically.
sentence.Network_cn: 地衣是一种绿藻或蓝藻与一种真菌共生的形式.

sentence.Network_en: Different populations living together and interacting. Populations can interact as competitors, predator and prey, or symbiotically.
sentence.Network_cn: 不同生物族群生活之间的互动, 以相互竞争 、 食或共生的方式生活著.

list.abs: symbiotic photobacterium 共生发光细菌symbiotic theory 共生说symmetry 对称
switching time 开关时间symbiotic star 共生星symbol of element 元素符号
symbiote 共生生物symbiotic bacterium 共生细菌symbiotic nitrogen fixation 共生固氮
共生关系 (Symbiotic relationship) P P Using the transactional diagram.

auth_sentence.content: Scientists have long known that microbes can work symbiotically with plants.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scientists have long known that microbes can work symbiotically with plants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scientists have long known that microbes can work symbiotically with plants.

auth_sentence.content: The entire idea manifested would show that humans could actually live symbiotically with nature.
auth_sentence.res_content: The entire idea manifested would show that humans could actually live symbiotically with nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The entire idea manifested would show that humans could actually live symbiotically with nature.

auth_sentence.content: MOND has dire implications for much modern cosmological thought which has developed symbiotically with dark matter.
auth_sentence.res_content: MOND has dire implications for much modern cosmological thought which has developed symbiotically with dark matter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: MOND has dire implications for much modern cosmological thought which has developed symbiotically with dark matter.
